Scribo

My personal blog built with 11ty.

Summary

This repo contains the source code for my blog, including my markdown blog posts.

Local Development

To run this project locally run npm i then npx @11ty/eleventy --serve

Credits

This project could not have been built without Koa Brooks' tutorial on eleventy and netlify cms. The tutorial can be found here: https://dev.to/koabrook/creating-a-basic-blog-with-eleventy-and-netlify-cms-completely-from-scratch-197e
